hackathon_experience.name: TYNET 2.0: International Women Hackathon (Round 2)
hackathon_experience.description: Created a waste management solution with route optimization for garbage trucks, gamification, and a community-driven events section.

hackathon_experience.name: Bit and Build Hackathon
hackathon_experience.description: Assisted in organizing and coordinating logistics for the hackathon, ensuring smooth event execution and team collaboration. Contributed as a graphic designer, creating visual assets for the event and promoting the hackathon's branding.

summary: Computer Engineering student with a passion for web application development and graphic design. Creates intuitive, user-centered digital experiences and brings designs to life through both coding and visuals. Eager to apply skills and creativity to dynamic web development projects and contribute to innovative solutions.

education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Engineering with honors in Data Science
education.institution: Fr. Conceicao Rodrigues College of Engineering

work_experience.description: Developed a native Android application for seamless video conferencing. Integrated the app with existing website functionalities. Developed a web application using Spring Boot for the backend and React for the frontend. The application scraped bond data from various websites and displayed it on the company's website.

At HyperVerge (Note: This seems to be a typo and should likely be Svirtz Technologies), designed and optimized client onboarding workflows, ensuring seamless integration and scalability for enterprise solutions. Developed AI-driven system architectures that streamlined document verification while adhering to banking compliance norms and regulatory requirements. By automating key processes, enhanced operational efficiency, reduced friction in onboarding, and improved overall user experience.
Built a user-centric immigration website with task management, document storage, and real-time updates to streamline processes.

projects.name: Dimensionality Reduction using Metaheuristic Algorithms
projects.description: Developed a dimensionality reduction approach using metaheuristic algorithms to optimize feature selection in high-dimensional datasets. By leveraging techniques like Genetic Algorithms and Particle Swarm Optimization, improved computational efficiency while retaining essential data patterns for better machine learning performance.

projects.name: Smart Bin+
projects.description: Developed a smart waste management system integrating IoT and machine learning for responsible disposal with mobile app and cloud features.

projects.name: College Management System
projects.description: A responsive web platform for automating exam schedules, grading, and attendance tracking in universities.

achievements: First Place - Sun Hacks 2024 International Hackathon

research_work.title: SmartBin+: Elevating Responsible Waste Disposal with Rewards
research_work.description: Lead author of a research paper selected for the 4th International Conference on Sustainable Expert Systems, affiliated with IEEE. The research focuses on developing an intelligent waste management system utilizing IoT and machine learning to incentivize proper waste disposal.
research_work.publication_status: Presented at ICSES 4th Conference, published in IEEE Xplore
